name: TestimonialCardThirteen
description: Testimonial cards with star ratings or quote icon, testimonial text, and author details.

description.example: Hear from those who've experienced our work

testimonial.example: Amazing product that transformed our workflow!

imageSrc.note: Author avatar image (either imageSrc or icon required)

icon.note: LucideIcon for author avatar (either imageSrc or icon required)

propsSchema.testimonials: Array<{ id: string, name: string, handle: string, testimonial: string, rating: number, imageSrc?: string, imageAlt?: string, icon?: LucideIcon }>
propsSchema.showRating: boolean - true for star ratings, false for quote icon (required)
propsSchema.title: string
propsSchema.titleSegments?: Array<{ type: 'text', content: string } | { type: 'image', src: string, alt?: string }> - For inline images in title
propsSchema.buttons?: Array<{text: string, onClick?: () => void, href?: string}>

usageExample: <TestimonialCardThirteen testimonials={[{ id: '1', name: 'Jack', handle: '@jack', testimonial: 'Amazing experience!', rating: 5, icon: Quote }, { id: '2', name: 'Sarah', handle: '@sarah', testimonial: 'Highly recommended!', rating: 4, imageSrc: '/testimonials/sarah.jpg' }]} showRating={true} title="What Our Clients Say" description="Hear from those who've experienced our work" textboxLayout="default" animationType="slide-up" useInvertedBackground="noInvert" />
